A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a great movie and a very unexpected turn for this new series! Very well acted compared to the original and prequel trilogies; amazing effects (as predicted); and a suspenseful and thoughtful story. I am dumbfounded as to a sizable sample size of Star Wars fans. No\, this movie does not spoon-feed you background stories. This is similar to the original trilogy: we didn’t know anything about Obi Wan’s family or the Emperor’s past or much of anything at all about Yoda. And if you want Luke to be a perfect and all powerful light saber user\, go play a video game and control his every move. These characters have so much more depth/internal conflict than the original good vs evil original trilogy.
